Reviews.Title: “Excellent location. Clean and tidy but very small.”
Reviews.Author: Chris G
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights april 2012 wife daughter friend near rialto bridge st marks square extremely expensive central pay 100 euros night stayed venice times lido value 3 maybe 4 trip fancied central location 5 minutes walk teh rialto bridge 10 minutes st marks ideal yes double bathroom seen pretty clean yes walls thin hear people whispering walked past door slept pretty safe sampled real venice hotel safe quaint shame bar door wasnt little cheaper convenience americans hate ice hotel air conditioning safe pool pretty basic cant relax except maybe breakfast cant fault staff staff hotel nice summarise hotel quaint stay theres canals cute narrow alleyways busy shops handy sights low expectations wont disappointed youll pay similar price hotels nearer train station thats 20 minutes near nice memories venice hotel job hotel yes
